headline: Jim Cramer Calls Marvell’s Recent Sell Rating “Ridiculous”
summary: Marvell Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MRVL) is one of the 11 stocks Jim Cramer put under the microscope recently. headline: Jim Cramer Calls AMD a “Semi-Meaningful Competitor” to NVIDIA
summary: Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMD) is one of the 13 stocks Jim Cramer recently shed light on. During the episode, Cramer called the stock a “semi-meaningful competitor” to NVIDIA. He said: “Lately though, we’ve been seeing AMD, their only semi-meaningful competitor; stock’s up like 40 straight points, win[s] a lot of business. Same with Cisco, […]

headline: Kevin O'Leary Says TikTok Deal Is Dead — And U.S. Law Must Finally Decide Who Owns Your Data
summary: Celebrity investor Kevin O'Leary says the window to buy TikTok with its current Chinese-owned algorithm has officially closed. As a new 90-day deadline ticks down, O'Leary is sounding the alarm: TikTok's future in the U.S. hangs in the balance, and at the heart of it is a much bigger issue — who truly owns your personal data? Why the Sale Keeps Getting Delayed TikTok's Chinese parent company, ByteDance, is under pressure from a U.S. law enacted last year that requires it to sell its TikTok asset

headline: What Are 5 AI Stocks Growing Revenue by 30% or More to Buy Right Now?
summary: Nvidia, AMD, and TSMC are all seeing tremendous growth thanks to the boom in AI infrastructure spending.  Palantir's Artificial Intelligence Platform should be a growth driver for many years to come.  Make no mistake, investors love revenue growth, and investing in companies that are growing their top lines quickly can be quite rewarding.
